Package net.officefloor.frame.api.build

Interface OfficeFloorListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClockFactoryImpl, NettyHttpServerImplementation, OfficeFloorMBeanRegistratorImpl, UndertowHttpServerImplementation
    public interface OfficeFloorListener
    Listens to the open/close of the OfficeFloor.
    Author:
    Daniel Sagenschneider

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void officeFloorClosed​(OfficeFloorEvent event)
      Notifies that the OfficeFloor has been closed.
      void officeFloorOpened​(OfficeFloorEvent event)
      Notifies that the OfficeFloor has been opened.
